long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Chrome with Earth live wallpapers, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for an immersive global view.

Bring the beauty of our planet to your browser with the Earth Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Each new tab reveals stunning, high-definition live wallpapers of Earth from space, capturing breathtaking scenes of continents, oceans, and clouds slowly rotating beneath the stars. Perfect for nature lovers, travelers, and space enthusiasts, these live wallpapers provide a tranquil, awe-inspiring view of our planet.

Alongside its captivating visuals, the extension also offers a built-in Google search bar for quick browsing, plus customizable quick-access icons to keep your favorite sites close at hand. This seamless blend of function and visual appeal allows you to stay productive while enjoying Earth's serene beauty in the background.

Ideal for anyone drawn to the wonders of space and the natural world, the Earth Live Wallpaper extension lets you explore the globe from your browser. Each new tab becomes a gentle reminder of our worldâ€™s grandeur, inspiring you as you navigate the web!
